about: A reimplementation of the default CKAN dataset schema - CCCA Metadata Editor
mdedit_note: These notes (mdedit_note field) are not processed and serve just for user information

dataset_fields.label: Title
dataset_fields.help_text: A title for your dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Abstract
dataset_fields.help_text: Brief narrative summary of the content of the dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Status of the resource(s)
dataset_fields.help_text: Status of the resource(s) within this dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Metadata Language
dataset_fields.help_text: Language used for the metadata (default english)

dataset_fields.label: Metadata Date
dataset_fields.help_text: Date of creation or last modification of this Dataset (automatically inserted)

dataset_fields.label: License
dataset_fields.help_text: License definitions and additional information can be found at

dataset_fields.label: Server State of the Dataset
dataset_fields.help_text: Server internal state (automatically filled)

dataset_fields.title: Constraints on Usage and Access with respect to the Resources

dataset_fields.label: Use Limitation
dataset_fields.help_text: Limitation affecting the fitness for use of the resource or metadata. Example: 'not to be used for navigation'

dataset_fields.label: Access Constraints
dataset_fields.help_text: Access constraints applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations on obtaining the resource or metadata.

dataset_fields.label: Use Constraints
dataset_fields.help_text: Constraints applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations or warnings on using the resource or metadata.

dataset_fields.label: Handling Restrictions
dataset_fields.help_text: Handling restrictions on the resource or metadata: unclassified, restricted, confidential, top secret, ...

dataset_fields.label: Topic Category/ies
dataset_fields.help_text: Main theme(s) of the dataset. See

dataset_fields.label: Keywords
dataset_fields.help_text: Commonly used word(s) or formalised word(s) or phrase(s) used to describe the subject.

dataset_fields.label: Keyword Type
dataset_fields.help_text: Subject matter used to group smimlar keywords

choices.label: discipline - keyword identifies a branch of instruction or specialized learning
stratum - keyword identifies the layer(s) of any deposited substance
temporal - keyword identifies a time period related to the dataset
theme - keyword identifies a particular subject or topic

dataset_fields.label: Thesaurus Name
dataset_fields.help_text: Official title of the used Thesaurus, or other vocabulary or dictionary used.

dataset_fields.label: Reference Date
dataset_fields.help_text: Reference date for the cited Thesaurus.

dataset_fields.label: Date Type
dataset_fields.help_text: Datetype for the cited Thesaurus reference date.

dataset_fields.mdedit_note: Do not name this field 'spatial' leads to import errors with harvester! Anja 7.12.16
dataset_fields.label: Polygon
dataset_fields.help_text: Select area describing the dataset spatial extend

dataset_fields.label: West Bound Longitude
dataset_fields.help_text: Western-most coordinate of the limit of the resource extent, expressed in longitude in decimal degrees (positive east).

dataset_fields.label: East Bound Longitude
dataset_fields.help_text: Eastern-most coordinate of the limit of the resource extent, expressed in longitude in decimal degrees (positive east).

dataset_fields.label: South Bound Latitude
dataset_fields.help_text: Southern-most coordinate of the limit of the resource extent, expressed in latitude in decimal degrees (positive north).

dataset_fields.label: North Bound Latitude
dataset_fields.help_text: Northern-most coordinate of the limit of the resource extent, expressed in latitude in decimal degrees (positive north).

dataset_fields.label: Starting Date
dataset_fields.help_text: Starting date for the datasets temporal extent.

dataset_fields.label: Ending Date
dataset_fields.help_text: Ending date for the datasets temporal extent.

dataset_fields.label: Date of creation
dataset_fields.help_text: Date of creation of the resources within this dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Date of publication
dataset_fields.help_text: Date of publication of the resources within this  dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Date of revision
dataset_fields.help_text: Date of revision of the resources within this  dataset

dataset_fields.title: Quality and Validity of the resources

dataset_fields.label: Equivalent Scale
dataset_fields.help_text: Equivalent scale:level of detail expressed as the scale denominator of a comparable hardcopy map or chart; dictance:ground sample distance

dataset_fields.label: Scale Distance
dataset_fields.help_text: Ground sample distance. Positive integer(equivalent scale); number expressing the distance value and a unit of measure of the distance value(distance)

dataset_fields.label: Lineage
dataset_fields.help_text: General explanation of the data producer's knowledge about the lineage of a dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Specification
dataset_fields.help_text: Citation of the product specification or user requirement against which data is beeing evaluated.

choices.label: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1205/2008 of 3 December 2008 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards metadata;2008-12-04
Corrigendum to INSPIRE Metadata Regulation published in the Official Journal of the European Union, L 328, page 83;2009-12-15

Commission Regulation (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services;2010-12-08
COMMISSION REGULATION (EU) No 1088/2010 of 23 November 2010 amending Regulation (EC) No 976/2009 as regards download services and transformation services;2010-12-08
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 976/2009 of 19 October 2009 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards the Network Services;2009-10-20

COMMISSION REGULATION (EU) No 268/2010 of 29 March 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards the access to spatial data sets and services of the Member States by Community institutions and bodies under harmonised conditions;2010-03-30

Commission Decision of 5 June 2009 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards monitoring and reporting (notified under document number C(2009) 4199) (2009/442/EC);2009-06-11

dataset_fields.label: Degree
dataset_fields.help_text: Indication of the conformance result.

dataset_fields.title: Contact and Owner Information regarding your dataset

dataset_fields.label: Organization
dataset_fields.mdedit_note: Important: erst org leer, damit nicht falscher default eingestellt wird (sonst AAU!) Anja 7.12.16
dataset_fields.help_text: Metadata Point of Contact: Name of responsible Organization

dataset_fields.label: Webpage
dataset_fields.help_text: Webpage of the responsible Organization.

dataset_fields.label: Citation Info
dataset_fields.help_text: Please enter the name(s) to be used in the citation reference for this dataset and resources. Default: Dataset Creator (see field below)

dataset_fields.label: Responsible Individual
dataset_fields.help_text: Metadata Point of Contact: Name of responsible Individual

dataset_fields.label: Responsible Individual E-Mail
dataset_fields.help_text: Mail Address of Responsible Individual

dataset_fields.label: Role
dataset_fields.mdedit_note: Important that this field is required to let the user see this page with default values. This field is empty by default. Anja 7.12.16

choices.mdedit_note: This field is added to have a default empty value and force the user to actively select a role and therby review the contact page

dataset_fields.label: Dataset Creator
dataset_fields.help_text: Creator of this Dataset including the resources

dataset_fields.label: Dataset Creator E-Mail
dataset_fields.help_text: Mailadress of Dataset Creator

resource_fields.label: Title
resource_fields.help_text: Name by which the resource is known.

resource_fields.label: Description
resource_fields.help_text: Brief narrative summary of the content of the resource.

resource_fields.label: Format Name
resource_fields.help_text: Name of the data transfer format(s) of the resource.

resource_fields.label: Format Version
resource_fields.help_text: Version of the format(date, number, etc.).

resource_fields.label: Resource URI
resource_fields.help_text: Uniformed Resource Identifier (URI) - world wide valid and citable. Provided automatically by the CCCA Data Center. (later)
